addressCsv.name: address
addressCsv.description: Address of the account to query (can be expressed as CSV).

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Limit to apply to the query results.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Offset to apply to the query results.

height.name: height
height.description: Query by height or a height range. Can be expressed as an interval i.e. `1:20` or `1:` or `:20`. Specified values are inclusive.

timestamp.name: timestamp
timestamp.description: Query by timestamp or a timestamp range. Can be expressed as an interval i.e. `1000000:2000000` or `1000000:` or `:2000000`. Specified values are inclusive.

search.name: search
search.description: Search query. Supports both partial and full case-insensitive text search.

searchByNameAddressPubKey.name: search
searchByNameAddressPubKey.description: Case-insensitive search by name, address or publicKey. Supports both partial and full text search.
